name: Aura Metal - Italy
description: ERGA® – Italian Top Quality Pens -- Since 1968. The Elegance of Metal....a unique design --- PaolaMoriDesign. The metal takes shape to follow the smooth lines of this elegant design offering fashionable colours and rich details. Copper metal retractable ballpoint pen, matt finishing, compatible Parker High quality Germany black ink refill with tungsten carbide ball, 4000m. Engraving golden copper colour image.
additionalInfo: Italian Design and Make. Exclusive to Dex Collection in Australia and New Zealand.
productDisclaimer: GST additional. Other additional charges may apply. We reserve the right to change prices and charges without notice.
